original: Hetuṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
